meta.title: Heatmap: Amount by Product and Country

questions.question: Why do consumer preferences differ significantly between countriesï¼Ÿ

ground_truth.answer: Because each country is influenced by geographical environment, climate, and customs, this can lead to significant differences in the consumption of different types of chocolate products.
key_insights: 50% Dark Bites performs well in Australia.
There are clearly blockbuster products in the Indian market.

reasoning.reasoning: Because it is evident from the provided heat map that this cell has the darkest colour, indicating the highest consumption.

India's 'Eclairs' and 'Raspberry Choco' are the darkest areas in the entire chart (close to 40), indicating that the sales/orders of these two products in India are much higher than other products, making them the core bestsellers locally.
